kannada_original: ಬಯಲಿನಲಿ ಮೇವುಣುವ ಹಸು ಬಣ್ಣ ನೂರು ಬಗೆ
english_transliteration: Bayalinalli mēvuṇuva hasu baṇṇa nūru bage
english_translation: The cows grazing in the field are of a hundred colors
But milk is one in color, form, and taste.

kannada_original: ಹರಿವ ನದಿ ನೂರಿರಲಿ, ಕೊನೆಗೆ ಗುರಿ ಕಡಲೊಂದ
english_transliteration: Hariva nadi nūrirali, konege guri kaḍalonda
english_translation: Let there be a hundred flowing rivers, the final goal is one ocean
The Supreme Reality is one! – Muddu Rāma.
